{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05096v1", "title": "The negative symmetry classification problem", "summary": "A negative symmetry is a nonlocal symmetry of special type. In this paper, we
introduce a method for constructing negative symmetries from consistent
triplets of differential and differential-difference equations. Moreover, we
study the relation between 3D consistent equations in the discrete case and the
continuous case.", "main_category": "nlin.SI", "categories": "nlin.SI", "published": "2025-05-08T09:50:41Z"}
